card_knowledge.description: Understanding of individual card meanings in upright and reversed positions

scoring_guide.excellent: Demonstrates deep understanding of card symbolism, traditional meanings, and nuanced interpretations. Accurately interprets both upright and reversed positions.
scoring_guide.good: Shows solid grasp of basic card meanings with some awareness of reversed interpretations. Occasionally misses subtle nuances.
scoring_guide.satisfactory: Understands fundamental card meanings but may lack depth or accuracy in reversed positions. Some interpretations may be generic.
scoring_guide.needs_improvement: Limited or inaccurate understanding of card meanings. Struggles with reversed interpretations or provides generic responses.

key_indicators: Understanding of upright vs. reversed distinctions
Use of card symbolism and imagery

position_relevance.description: How well the reader connects card meanings to their specific positions in the spread

scoring_guide.excellent: Seamlessly integrates card meanings with position significance. Shows clear understanding of how position context modifies interpretation.
scoring_guide.good: Generally connects cards to positions well, with occasional missed opportunities for deeper position-specific insights.
scoring_guide.satisfactory: Basic understanding of position meanings but may not fully utilize this context in interpretation.
scoring_guide.needs_improvement: Little to no integration of position significance. Treats cards as isolated meanings rather than contextual elements.

key_indicators: Integration of card and position significance

reading_coherence.description: How well individual card interpretations are woven together into a cohesive narrative

scoring_guide.excellent: Creates a compelling, logical narrative that connects all elements. Cards work together to tell a unified story addressing the question.
scoring_guide.good: Generally cohesive reading with most elements connecting well. May have minor gaps in narrative flow.
scoring_guide.satisfactory: Basic attempt at synthesis but may feel like individual card readings rather than integrated interpretation.
scoring_guide.needs_improvement: Disconnected interpretations with little effort to create narrative coherence or address the question holistically.

key_indicators: Coherent response to the original question

empathy_communication.description: Compassionate, sensitive communication style appropriate for the client's emotional state

scoring_guide.excellent: Demonstrates exceptional empathy and emotional intelligence. Language is compassionate, validating, and appropriately supportive.
scoring_guide.good: Generally empathetic with good emotional awareness. May occasionally miss emotional nuances or use slightly insensitive language.
scoring_guide.satisfactory: Basic empathy shown but may lack depth or use somewhat clinical language. Appropriate but not particularly warm.
scoring_guide.needs_improvement: Limited empathy or inappropriate emotional response. May be cold, judgmental, or insensitive to client's emotional state.

practical_guidance.description: Providing actionable, realistic advice that empowers the client

scoring_guide.excellent: Offers specific, actionable guidance that empowers client choice. Balances spiritual insight with practical considerations.
scoring_guide.good: Provides helpful guidance with some specific suggestions. Generally empowering but may lack concrete steps.
scoring_guide.satisfactory: Basic advice given but may be vague or generic. Some attempt at practical application.
scoring_guide.needs_improvement: Vague, impractical, or disempowering advice. May avoid giving guidance or provide unrealistic suggestions.

ethical_considerations.description: Adherence to ethical tarot reading practices and boundaries

scoring_guide.excellent: Demonstrates clear ethical boundaries. Avoids prediction addiction, maintains client autonomy, and shows cultural sensitivity.
scoring_guide.good: Generally ethical with good boundary awareness. May have minor lapses in ethical considerations.
scoring_guide.satisfactory: Basic ethical awareness but may not consistently apply ethical principles throughout reading.
scoring_guide.needs_improvement: Poor ethical boundaries. May be overly predictive, disempowering, or culturally insensitive.

intuitive_insight.description: Going beyond textbook meanings to provide deeper, intuitive connections

scoring_guide.excellent: Demonstrates clear intuitive insights that enhance card meanings. Offers unique perspectives that feel authentic and relevant.
scoring_guide.good: Some intuitive elements present that add value to the reading. Generally enhances rather than contradicts traditional meanings.
scoring_guide.satisfactory: Limited intuitive input but doesn't detract from reading quality. Mostly relies on traditional interpretations.
scoring_guide.needs_improvement: Either no intuitive elements or inappropriate intuitive claims that contradict card meanings or seem fabricated.

beginner.expectations: Basic accuracy and compassionate tone. Less emphasis on synthesis and intuitive elements.

intermediate.expectations: Good integration and practical application. Growing ethical awareness.

advanced.expectations: Sophisticated interpretation with strong intuitive elements and cultural awareness.

expert.expectations: Demonstration of mastery across all areas with potential for teaching others.

practice_suggestions: Study reversed card meanings more thoroughly
Practice connecting cards in storytelling exercises
Work on active listening and validation skills
Develop comfort with giving specific advice
Study different cultural approaches to divination
